subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: South Carolina’s board of trustees approved a tax-deferred retirement package Friday for the football coach Steve Spurrier that would pay him $1 million if he remained with the Gamecocks for the next four seasons. Spurrier makes about $1.75 million a year.
